p.s: I hope you are fine in this crazy times.
How are you doing in Canada?
I know that you think about spending a year in Germany or Berlin after school.
Yesterday I found an article that deals exactly with this topic.
That is why I want to give you a short summary, in English obviously, of this article.
The article from the Hannoversche Allgemeine Zeitung and was written 2016 by Marina Kormbaki.
In the beginning the author describes Berlin as a city that is similar to London, Brooklyn or Sydney.
Furthermore many englishspeakingEnglish-speaking tourists or students come to Berlin, but some of them stay in Berlin.
English is important for the everyday life in Berlin.
The author says that you have disadvantages, if you cannot speak English.
If you walk through Berlin, it would be not unusual to do not hear a word in German.
Berlin is a world city.
Moreover the article describes the everyday life.
You have cafes that could be in Toronto, L. A. or Hongkong too.
Also bookstores exist, that sell englishEnglish books.
CulturCulture and nightlife are arguments for Berlin too.
One problem is the rent.
In the last 5 years it exploded.
I hope that this text was interesting for.
It will be very nice, if you come to Germany.
We could meet again after such a long time.
Maybe I convinced you.
See you soon
